pages.text: $(li)iChisel is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/chisel/diamond_chisel)Diamond Chisel$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one has more durability and new features than the last one.$(br)$(li)In the GUI of the iChisel now you have the Preview mode.

$(li)This function allows you to see the Chiseled version resultant block before convert it.$(br)$(li)In addition, two new modes have been added.$(br)$(li)Contiguous: Chisel an area of alike blocks, extending 10 blocks in any direction$(br)$(li)Contiguous (2D): Chisel an area of alike blocks, extending 10 blocks along the plane of the current side
